mapper.select: select board_idx title, hit_cnt, creator_id, date_format(created_dt, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as created_dt, updater_id, date_format(updated_dt, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as updated_dt, deleted_yn from board where deleted_yn = 'N' order by board_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (title,contents, creator_id, created_dt, updater_id, updated_dt) values(${title}, contents, ${creatorId}, now(), ${creatorId}, now())
